```{r}
library(tidyverse)
# I like this for coloring text: https://wilkelab.org/ggtext/
library(ggtext)
library(googlesheets4)

```

```{r,fig.height= 10, fig.width= 16}
pop_colors <- (rep(c('#39553A'), 40))
iraq_data<- read_sheet('https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Oegm5JgkLwkgHyIqE2-6j8TT6JvQ3gq61gB2FEXAxWk/edit?usp=sharing')

```

```{r}
ggplot(iraq_data, 
       aes(x = type, y= value, fill= fill))+
  geom_bar(stat= 'identity',
           position= position_dodge())+
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = c(0,.5,1,1.5,2,2.5,3,3.5,4), limits= c(0,3.5), expand= expansion(mult=c(0,0)))+  scale_fill_manual(values= pop_colors)+
  theme(legend.position= "none")

```
